Jekyll-DB

An easy way to use Jekyll and Github Pages as a "database".
Items are just posts. Type to search. Click on row headers to sort.
See a JSON representation of the data below.

Productivity Lighting and Reflection Productivity decreases by reflection, according to 75% of the employees Telephonic interviews (200) ASID (1997)

Productivity and Distraction Lighting 9% of total experienced distraction can be explained by lighting Professional paper ASID (2005)

Built with Jekyll + ListJS + Bootstrap. See the readme for instruction on how to use..
